sourcesContent:
<template lang="html">
    <v-menu offset-y>
      <template v-slot:activator="{ on }">
        <v-btn icon v-on="on">
          <v-icon color="teal">
            mdi-share-variant
          </v-icon>
        </v-btn>
      </template>
      <v-list>
        <v-list-item
          @click='shareWithPractice'
        >
          <v-list-item-title>Share with {{user.active_practice_name}}</v-list-item-title>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list>
    </v-menu>
</template>

<script>
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js";

export default {
  name: "ShareScenario",
  props: {
    scenario: {
      type: Object,
      required: true,
    },
    user: {
      type: Object,
      required: true,
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      error: null
    };
  },
  computed: {
  },
  methods: {
    shareWithPractice() {
      let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenario.id}/`;
      apiService(endpoint, "PATCH", {
        practice: this.user.active_practice
        }).then(data => {
          console.log(data);
      });
    }
  }
};
</script>
